# Social Preview Image Guide

## Recommended Dimensions
- **Size**: 1280x640 pixels
- **Format**: PNG or JPG
- **Max file size**: 1MB

## Colors to Use
- **Primary**: #3b82f6 (Blue)
- **Secondary**: #8b5cf6 (Purple)
- **Accent**: #22c55e (Green)
- **Background**: #0a0a0a (Dark)
- **Text**: #ffffff (White)

## Tools to Create
- [Canva](https://www.canva.com/) - Free, easy to use
- [Figma](https://www.figma.com/) - Professional design tool
- [Photopea](https://www.photopea.com/) - Free Photoshop alternative

## Upload Instructions
1. Go to: Repository â†’ Settings â†’ General
2. Scroll to "Social preview"
3. Click "Edit"
4. Upload your image (1280x640px)
5. Click "Save"

## Preview
Your image will appear when sharing:
- GitHub repository links
- Twitter/X posts
- LinkedIn shares
- Discord embeds
- Slack messages
